mapper.sql: delivery_id AS "deliveryId",sku_id AS "skuId",delivery AS "delivery", customer_id AS "customerId", outstock_listing_id AS "outstockListingId", time AS "time", number AS "number", price AS "price", brand_id AS "brandId", deptId AS "deptId", create_time AS "createTime", create_user AS "createUser", update_time AS "updateTime", update_user AS "updateUser", display AS "display", item_id AS "itemId", state AS "state", outstock_order_id AS "outstockOrderId", outstock_apply_id AS "outstockApplyId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')
and deptId = #{paramCondition.deptId} or deptId in ( select dept_id from sys_dept where pids like CONCAT('%$[', #{paramCondition.deptId}, '$]%') escape '$' ))

select
from daoxin_erp_outstock_listing where 1 = 1 and display = 1
and outstock_listing_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockListingId},'%')
and time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.time},'%')
and number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.number},'%')
and price like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.price},'%')
and brand_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.brandId},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and item_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.itemId},'%')
and state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.state},'%')
and outstock_order_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockOrderId},'%')
and outstock_apply_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.outstockApplyId},'%')
